Patient Particulars: Name: Sandra; Sex: Female; Marital status: Divorced
History: Progress: Static; Present history: Patient and her husband got separated and both are busy with their lives. She is angry with her ex-husband for not taking out of enough time to spend with their children as she feels that children need their father; Personal history: Family history- Patient is divorced and is living with her children.
Current Mental Status Examination: Behaviour: She was cooperative and rapport could be established; Mood: Frustrated; Affect: Broad; Thought: Content- reflected annoyance towards ex-husband
Psychotherapy Technique: Locating emotion; Words and language ("I" statements), Empty Chair, Here and now
Issues discussed in Current Session: Patient expressed that she was angry with her ex-husband for not spending time with their children. Techniques were introduced by the therapist to acknowledge these feelings and react accordingly.
Action Plan: Patient has to talk with her ex-husband on the basis of the insights she gained from the session.
